1: Ri banal etzelal canimajic pune' man c'o jachin tereninak, e are' tak c'ut ri e suc' quejeki' ruc' cu'bisan c'uxaj jacha' ri coj.
2: Aretak man utz ta benak ri ulew, queq'uiyir ri k'atal tak tzij, are' c'u ri utzalaj c'amal be reta'm ruc'axic ri cholajil.
3: Ri banal etzelal ri cuban c'ax chque ri mebayib xak junam ruc' ri nimalaj jäb ri cusach qui wäch ri tico'n.
4: Ri cäquitas quib caquiya' can ri pixab cäquiya' u k'ij ri banal etzelal; ri caquitz'akatisaj cäquic'ulelaj.
5: Ri e banal tak etzelal man c'o ta jas cäquich'ob che ri suq'uilal, jachin tak c'ut ri quenakajin che ri Ajawaxel cäquich'ob ronojel.
6: Are utz na uxic meba' tz'akatisanel c'ut pa ronojel che uxic k'inom ri xak quieb u pam.
7: Ri cutz'akatisaj u banic ri u pixab ri Dios jun c'ojolaxel wa' ri c'oxomanel, are' c'u ri cäbin cuc' tak ri ajwi'lab q'uixbal wa' che ri u tat.
8: Ri quebumulij tak k'inomal rumal ri ral puak ri cutok'ij, quebumulij che ri quel u c'u'x chque ri mebayib.
9: We c'o jun man craj taj coc il che ri u pixab ri Dios, mawi ri Dios man quebuc'och' ta ri e u ch'awem ruc'.
10: Ri quebuc'am bic ri e utz pa itzel be cäkaj na pa ri u c'amibal; e are' c'u ri winak ri man c'o ta etzelal caquibano cäquic'am na ri sibalaj utz na.
11: Ri k'inom cuna' rib chi sibalaj ajno'j, are' c'u ri meba' ri cac'oxomanic cuya' cuc'ambejej.
12: Aretak quech'äcan ri suc', cäban nimalaj nimak'ij; aretak quech'äcan ri banal tak etzelal, ri winak cäquic'u' quib.
13: Jachin ri quebusach u tza'm ri macaj man utz ta quel na; are' c'u ri quebuk'alajisaj cutanaba' c'u qui banic, cäsach na u mac.
14: Utz re ri winak ri amak'el cuya' u k'ij ri Ajawaxel; are' c'u ri cuban co che ri ranima' cäkaj na pa ri quiäkasakil.
15: Cajunamataj ruc' jun coj ri cawunic o jun os ri bik'onel ri banal etzelal ri cajawin puwi' jun meba'laj tinimit.
16: Ri k'atal tzij ri man c'o ta u no'j cunimatajisaj ri u banic c'ax; are' c'u ri man quiäk rayinel taj naj cäc'asi na.
17: Jachin ri u banom jun cämic man cätaq'ui' ta na c'ä cätzak na pa ri mukbal: ¡C'o jun mutijtobej u k'atixic!
18: Ri winak ri tz'akatisanel pa ronojel man c'o ta cuc'ulmaj, are' c'u ri itzel winak cätzak na pa ri etzelal.
19: Jachin ri cutajij ri rulew, cäto'taj na ri cutijo; ri cäbin cuc' sak'orib, ri cäto'taj ruc' are ri mebayil.
20: Jachin ri ya'tal u jiquibaxic c'uxaj caya' na u k'ij; jachin sibalaj curayij ri k'inomal man cäcanaj ta canok chi ma ta cac'äjisax u wäch.
21: Man ya'tal ta u yok'ic jachin jun; c'ä xa ne xa rumal jun ch'akap caxlanwa cuya' cäban macunic.
22: Ri quiäk rayinel cäsac'satic rumal rech chi k'inom, man reta'm ta c'ut chi cäpe na ri mebayil puwi'.
23: Ri cäbin che jun winak chi chuk'ila' rib, chuq'uisbalil sibalaj curik' na tok'ob, chuwäch ri cuya' u k'ij.
24: Cachil banal tak c'ax jachin ri queläk' chquij ri u nan u tat cucoj c'u pa ch'o'j che u bixic chi man c'o ta jas u banom.
25: Ri sibalaj caquiäk rayinic quebuyac tak ch'o'j; are c'u ri cujiquiba' u c'u'x chrij ri Ajawaxel cäpax u wäch ri cubano.
26: Xuwi jun man c'o ta u no'j cujiquiba' u c'u'x chquij ri e u chomanic; ri cäpatanij ruc' no'j man c'o ta jas cuc'ulmaj.
27: Jachin ri cuban tok'ob che ri meba' man c'o ta cäq'uetet wi, are c'u ri cuk'il ri u to'banic che sibalaj cäc'okox na.
28: Aretak quech'äcan ri banal tak etzelal ri winak cäquic'u' quib; aretak copan ri q'uisbal qui k'ij, quetakan tak ri suc'.
